room_title: Escape room "Dream Traveler" by FLEE in Seattle
review: Our group tried the Dream Traveler room. The atmosphere was fantastic, and it gets better from one room to another (this is also my first multi-room experience). The backstory really helped enhance the puzzle because it's not just about brute forcing through a mental exercise that can be placed anywhere without context.Definitely would come back to try other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Dream Traveler" by FLEE in Seattle
review: We tried it out during our holiday stay in Seattle and our friends took us there. It's really a fun experience and I was impressed by all those tricks in the dream traveller theme. Would definitely try others out next time in Seattle!

room_title: Escape room "Dream Traveler" by FLEE in Seattle
review: Nice place to have fun with friends. See if you smart enough to reach the final. Really challenge puzzle and exciting story. Highly recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "Dream Traveler" by FLEE in Seattle
review: There are five different themes. We only tried one of them and it was great. Definitely will come back for other theme rooms.
